dfischer.utils

Interface VaryingTestDurationInterface


  • public interface VaryingTestDurationInterface
    Supports to reduce or to extend the test duration of a running load test job.
    Since:
    Proxy Sniffer V5.2-O

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPlannedTestDuration()
      Get the currently planned test duration from the load test program.
      void setExtendTestDuration(int deltaSeconds)
      Advise the load test program to extend or to reduce the planned test duration.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlannedTestDuration

        int getPlannedTestDuration()
        Get the currently planned test duration from the load test program.
        Returns:
        the currently planned test duration in seconds, 0 = unlimited test duration

      • setExtendTestDuration

        void setExtendTestDuration(int deltaSeconds)
        Advise the load test program to extend or to reduce the planned test duration.
        Parameters:
        deltaSeconds - the number of seconds to extend or to reduce the planned test duration, 0 = unlimited test duration
